name: Scarf Squid
description:
Collect more scarves than your opponent or the Squid Squadron.

This Game has local 2 player multiplayer. An original Soundtrack and controller Support.

I made this game with @Jakealexshaw

The Programs we used for this project were:

Unity 2017

Visual Studio 2017

3ds Max 2018

Substance Painter

Krita

Photoshop

Audacity

For organisation we used Trello.
